Class MoreArrays

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.collections.MoreArrays

    Methods in this class still in use will be migrated to lenskit-core.

extends Object

    • Method Detail

      • isSorted

        public static boolean isSorted(long[] data,
                               int start,
                               int end)
        Deprecated. 

        Check that the array is sorted. Duplicates are not allowed in a sorted array, by this method’s definition.

        Parameters:
        data - The data to test for sortedness.
        start - The beginning of the range to test (inclusive)
        end - The end of the range to test (exclusive).
        Returns:
        true iff the array is sorted.

      • deduplicate

        public static int deduplicate(long[] data,
                              int start,
                              int end)
        Deprecated. 

        Remove duplicate elements in the backing store. The array should be sorted.

        Parameters:
        data - The data to deduplicate.
        start - The beginning of the range to deduplicate (inclusive).
        end - The end of the range to deduplicate (exclusive).
        Returns:
        the new end index of the array

      • deduplicate

        public static int deduplicate(int[] data,
                              int start,
                              int end)
        Deprecated. 

        Remove duplicate elements in the backing store. The array should be sorted.

        Parameters:
        data - The data to deduplicate.
        start - The beginning of the range to deduplicate (inclusive).
        end - The end of the range to deduplicate (exclusive).
        Returns:
        the new end index of the array
